title: How do people only spend 50-100 dollars a month on food lol

body:
Maybe it's the culture, I'm a very fragile person so my parents often time buy these for me.

cost of eating out at some of the Chinese restaurants.
This is a very typical cost for a table of ten, like if you're eating with your relatives


http://i66.tinypic.com/10cok7s.png[/IMG]
if you talk to the managers of this restaurant, small talk. They will point out the obvious to you this is already cheap considering what's in this set course. Since you're getting the set course instead of choosing each item
